tasks.task: Raising chicks (cardboard box, water, feed, heat source, pen)
subtasks: Provide water (bell waterer, apple cider vinegar)
Use different feeders (mason jars, plastic cups)
Employ heat source (ceramic heat bulb, infrared light)
Create pen (dog kennel, pine shavings, cardboard sides)
